subject: Order No. SF6047111321054
description_text:
Dear Customer,

Hello!

I am a customer service representative from SF International E-commerce. This email is to inform your company about the status of a related package, specifically: Order No. SF6047111321054. The customs feedback indicates that the submitted order screenshot is completely inconsistent with the original declaration information. Please confirm if the correct order screenshot has been provided.

We look forward to your reply and wish you a pleasant life!

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact QQ 800013683 or email iecomcs@sf-express.com. Thank you!
SF Express
International Customer Service Center
QQ_800013683
https://www.sf-international.com

conversations.body_text: SF6047111321054 The screenshot provided is the correct order information, please verify again. Recipient name: Masahiro Nata. Address (buyer's order language): Takanoomachi 634-5 E, Tsu City, Mie Prefecture, Japan, 5142221. Detailed address: Takanoomachi 634-5 E, Tsu shi, Mie ken, Japan, 5142221. Postal code: 5142221.
